sentences.en: GI microflora may inactivate certain drugs, reducing their absorption.
sentences.cn: 胃肠道内的菌丛可使某些药物失活, 降低药物的吸收.

sentences.en: It has been shown that ethylene oxide cannot inactivate spores entrapped in water - insoluble crystals.
sentences.cn: 已经表明环氧乙烷不能灭活封闭在不溶于水的晶体中的孢子.

sentences.en: Moistened flakes are heated to inactivate the antinutritional factors.
sentences.cn: 湿润的薄片需加热,以钝化抗营养的因素.

sentences.en: Spores occluded in water - soluble crystals are also difficult to inactivate with ethylene oxide.
sentences.cn: 封闭在 水溶性 晶体中的孢子很难被环氧乙烷灭活.

sentences.en: Temporarily inactivate the selected connection so that it cannot be used.
sentences.cn: 暂时停用所选网络因此无法使用.

sentences.en: The gases inactivate the enzyme cholinesterase, which normally controls the transmission of nerve impulses.
sentences.cn: 毒气可以减除胆碱酯酶的活性, 而这种酶在正常情况下控制着各种神经冲动的传导.

sentences.en: They also bind tightly to some of the TB P 450 enzymes and inactivate them.
sentences.cn: 氮杂茂可与结核菌内的一些P450酶类紧密结合使其失活.

sentences.en: They discovered how to inactivate knock out, single genes in laboratory animals.
sentences.cn: 他们发现如何使实验用动物体内个体特定基因不活跃、失去作用.

sentences.en: They discovered how to inactivate or knock out single genes in libratory animals.
sentences.cn: 他们发现如何在实验动物体内阻止单个基因的活性或敲除单个基因.

sentences.en: They quickly inactivate vegetative forms, but their sporicidal action is slow.
sentences.cn: 它能迅速灭活繁殖体, 但其杀孢子能力低.

sentences.en: To inactivate hormone, to make it lose its bioactivity.
sentences.cn: 使某些激素灭活, 使其失去生物学活性.

words.tran_cn: 不活跃的；不活动的；怠惰的；闲置的
[生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动

trans.tran_cn: 使不活动， 使不活跃
